Knowledge Blast.name: Knowledge Blast
Knowledge Blast.fullText:
Tome Adept Attack 11Knowledge Blast

You hold up your tome and concentrate all your knowledge through it into a beam of pure energy, firing it at your ignorant foe.

Encounter        Arcane, Implement, Psychic
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Requirement: You must be wielding a tome

Target: One creature

Attack: Intelligence vs. Will

Hit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and you push the target 2 squares. The target is dazed and takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 380, page(s) 44.
Knowledge Blast.flavor: You hold up your tome and concentrate all your knowledge through it into a beam of pure energy, firing it at your ignorant foe.

Librus Phantasma.name: Librus Phantasma
Librus Phantasma.fullText:
Tome Adept Attack 20Librus Phantasma

You open your tome and your foe flows into the book, where it must navigate through an eldritch labyrinth before returning to reality.

Daily        Arcane, Implement, Reliable
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Requirement: You must be wielding a tome

Target: One creature

Attack: Intelligence vs. Will

Hit: The target is trapped in your tome (save ends). While trapped, the target ceases to exist and can take no actions until it saves. It has line of sight and line of effect to no creature, and no creature has line of sight or line of effect to it. When the target saves, it reappears wherever it was when it was hit by this spell. If that square is occupied, it reappears in the nearest available square of the target’s choice.


Published in Dragon Magazine 380, page(s) 44.
Librus Phantasma.flavor: You open your tome and your foe flows into the book, where it must navigate through an eldritch labyrinth before returning to reality.

Ritual Master.name: Ritual Master
Ritual Master.fullText:
Tome Adept Utility 12Ritual Master

Your constant study has revealed the secrets of mysteries that archmages haven’t solved.

Daily        Arcane
Free Action      Personal

Effect: You gain a +10 power bonus to a single ritual skill check.


Published in Dragon Magazine 380, page(s) 44.
Ritual Master.flavor: Your constant study has revealed the secrets of mysteries that archmages haven’t solved.
Ritual Master.range:
Personal

Effect: You gain a +10 power bonus to a single ritual skill check.
